alert.note: Alert for Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 11:58AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following locations on the Mississippi River... Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Canton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Louisiana. * WHEN...From late Monday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The first quarter mile of Edison Avenue beyond the railroad tracks begins flooding near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning and continue rising to 16.0 feet Wednesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Mississippi River Louisiana 15.0 13.9 14.0 14.2 14.3 14.6 15.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The National Weather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
